title: RPA/Bot Developer
description: I'm passionate about automations and have extensive experience as an RPA/Bot Developer. I've created numerous bots for various applications, including e-commerce stores, web scraping, and betting websites.

title: Web3 Developer
description: I'm deeply fascinated by the world of Web3. As a Web3 Developer, I've delved into the exciting realm of decentralized applications, smart contracts, and blockchain technology.

title: Developer
description: Above all, I am a versatile software engineer who can handle a wide range of challenges. With a solid foundation in software development, I possess the adaptability and problem-solving skills needed to tackle any project.
